report.name: SuivCliRef

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT r.NUMSEQ NUMSEQ, r.CODMO CODMO, r.SIGDIRMO SIGDIRMO, r.CODGROUP CODGROUP, r.NOMGROUP NOMGROUP, r.CODSG CODSG, r.PID PID, r.PTYPE PTYPE, r.ARCTYPE ARCTYPE, r.CODCAMO CODCAMO, r.LIBPROJET LIBPROJET, r.CHEFPROJET CHEFPROJET, r.CONSOJH CONSOJH, r.REESTJH REESTJH, r.PROPOJH PROPOJH, r.PROPOMOJH PROPOMOJH, r.NOTIFJH NOTIFJH, r.ARBITJH ARBITJH, r.PROPOJHN1 PROPOJHN1, r.PROPOMOJHN1 PROPOMOJHN1 FROM tmpreftrans r, ligne_bip lb, proj_info p, application a WHERE r.numseq = :p_numseq AND r.pid = lb.pid AND lb.icpi = p.icpi AND lb.airt = a.airt &P_WHERE order by CODMO, CODGROUP, PTYPE, PID
